pages.text: A Mystic Branch allows an $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#light_infusion)Infused$(/l) player to draw $(l:symbology/introduction)Symbols$(/l) into the air and cast $(l:symbology/symbols_list)Spells$() with magical effects. Each Symbol will drain a bit of Infusion Power, and some symbols may be accessed only with a certain type of Infusion.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Symbols are drawn by holding the right mouse button and moving the mouse around in any direction. The symbols will appear in the air. Upon drawing a pattern that corresponds to a Spell, its name will appear, and upon release it will be casted.

pages.title: Spell Deflection
pages.text: The Mystic Branch can also be used to deflect targeted effects by hitting the Spell projectile. Deflection requires good timing, and not all effects can be deflected.
